title: One With the Mountains!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>I’ve been waiting for this day.... Last time you took a helicopter to the top, but today, we’re going to tread it together, step by step....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>G’mornin, Umi~! Look, check out my perfect climbing gear!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ooh, magnificent! With that said, isn’t your luggage a bit large?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>This is preparation for going in the secret hot spring♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Secret hot spring....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>They say that there’s a secret hot spring deep within this mountain. There are no roofs, no walls, nothing at all~, a place where you can feel at one with the mountain! Of course we’re going, right♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>No roofs, no walls, nothing....? There’s nothing? At all!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s right! A true union with nature!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>No, maybe it’s a little too early for me.... to experience such a deep feeling of unity like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s not true! Come on, let’s go, Umi! The secret hot spring is calling us~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
